## AuthenticationService.isAuthorized() method

Tests whether is used authorized for specified permission

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isAuthorized(permission: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  permission | <code>string</code> | Permission name that is tested |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<boolean>`

Promise<boolean> True if user is authorized otherwise false
